meanings.definition: A large muscle at the front of the thigh, divided into four parts.
meanings.sent1: Her quadriceps helped her kick the ball with strength.
meanings.sent2: He felt a strain in his quadriceps after running a marathon.
meanings.sent3: The quadriceps flexed proudly during the race.
meanings.sent4: His quadriceps were like sturdy pillars supporting his movements.
meanings.sent5: The quadriceps, like four warriors, stood ready for action.

meanings.definition: The four-headed muscle at the front of the thigh.
meanings.sent1: The quadriceps play a crucial role in walking and running.
meanings.sent2: She felt a burn in her quadriceps after doing squats.
meanings.sent3: The quadriceps seemed to have a mind of their own during the workout.
meanings.sent4: His quadriceps were like a team working together for strength.
meanings.sent5: The quadriceps, like four loyal friends, supported his movements.
